revised_title: The Absorption Spectra of Lithium and Cesium
tldr: The authors investigate the absorption spectra of lithium and cesium, discovering 27 new lines in the lithium principal series and a fluted region in both spectra. They discuss the physical characteristics of these series and compare them to other alkali metals, while also examining the dispersion curves for the vapors of sodium, potassium, and rubidium.
